name: Bruce Lee II
summary: In 2013, Bruno R. Marcos released a spiritual successor to the Bruce Lee game on his website. The game was called Bruce Lee II. It featured an Amstrad CPC mode and a Commodore 64 mode which gave the game a retro look like it was created for those two platforms in the first place. It also featured sampled sound from the 1984 Bruce Lee game in addition to some new ones.
